modernize-unary-static-assert.description:
Description

The check diagnoses any
static_assert
declaration with an
empty string literal and provides a fix-it note to replace the
declaration with a single-argument
static_assert
declaration.

The check is only applicable for C++17 and later code.

The following code:

void
f_textless
(
int
a
)
{
static_assert
(
sizeof
(
a
)
<=
10
,
""
);
}

is replaced by:

void
f_textless
(
int
a
)
{
static_assert
(
sizeof
(
a
)
<=
10
);
}
modernize-unary-static-assert.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
